Reviews.Title: Great camera for general picture taking!
Reviews.Author: Heather K.
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a decent camera for basic to intermediate picture taking, then this is a good choice. Unlike the only other review, the pictures come out clear & the videos are even better than the pictures in clarity & sound. Not very difficult to work the buttons or menu.Would love to keep it, but in need of some extra money so decided to sell.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: T. E. Anderson
Reviews.Content: I'm not going to long and drawn out on this one...The camera is junk and takes horrible blurry pictures.I'm not really sure I trust the Fuji name anymore. Caveat Emptor.

ProductInfo.Features:
18X Fujinon optical zoom
6.7X digital zoom
28mm wide-angle lens
Multiple shooting modes
Dual image stabilization, face-detectiontechnology
ProductInfo.Name: Fuji S2850 14MP 18X Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/ HD Movie Mode
